trustfund:
TF028396-PREPARATION OF ENVIRONMENTAL
            AUDIT REPORTS OF HEAVY INDUSTRIAL ENTERPRI,TF026695-PHRD-UKRAINE: PREPARATION OF
            THE SECOND PROGRAMMATIC ADJUSTMENT LOAN,TF029693-PHRD-UKRAINE PSAL PROJECT (BANK-EXECUTED),TF029723-PHRD-UKRAINE PSAL (RECIPIENT-EXECUTED),TF029546-PHRD-UKRAINE PSAL PROJECT (RECIPIENT-EXECUTED),TF029500-PHRD-UKRAINE PSAL PROJECT (BANK-EXECUTED)

abstracts.cdata!:
The Programmatic Adjustment Loan Project
            aims at supporting the medium-term economic development, and
            reform program in Ukraine, to set the basis for sustained
            economic growth, poverty reduction, and improved
            environmental protection. The project will further improve
            fiscal, and financial discipline, by eliminating
            non-transparent budget off-sets, reducing budget arrears,
            and increasing cash collections for energy. A more efficient
            regulatory framework for entry, and operation of enterprises
            will be in place, to improve corporate governance, and,
            up-to-date regulatory functions in critical sectors will be
            introduced. In the medium run, improved property rights will
            form the basis for the revival of economic growth coming
            from private investments, and foreign direct investments. In
            addition, public sector accountability is being strengthened
            through the public administration reforms, while, in the
            medium term, completion of fiscal reforms will remain a
            strong government commitment. And, completion of the pension
            reform, and improved health and education services, will
            help balance social assistance management. The highly
            volatile political, and socioeconomic environment are risks
            not to be underestimated, given the project's aim to
            reduce budget arrears, and streamline public administration.
